name: YoEmber.com - Dark
description: The most comprehensive and up-to-date tutorial to learn ember, in my opinion. In contrary to many other standard tutorials covers a broad spectrum of creating a full-fledged SPA. So to make it even easier to get into the super-advanced MVC-JS-Framwork (when you code your sleep away, like me) here's the more "healthier" late-night variant.
additional_info:
* Sep 14 2016: Syntax Highlighting small fix 
* Sep 02 2016: Adjusted class for code highlight sections
* Jun 28 2016: Toned down syntax coloring (old style coloring in comment below new section)
* Jun 23 2016: Initial release
